attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is against the legal rights for grandparents,which are to have the right to adopt our children if we choose to do that option or parental rights etc.Our children are set rules by the parents if the grandparents have no contact from the begining why should our children have to later on be made to have contact or live with complete strangers!Also if we adopt why would we want our parents to then have the right to look after them adoption is a serious matter and is the parents option for whatever reasons.
